main event: Observers witnessed a bright light in the sky over Irvington, New Jersey, which was later determined to be a hot air balloon.
interesting points: The observers initially thought the bright light was an unidentified flying object but later confirmed it was a hot air balloon with an electronic device attached., The sighting lasted for about 20 minutes., One observer reported the object was round with a silvery metallic appearance., The balloon was seen at an altitude of 1000 to 1500 feet moving in an irregular pattern., A separate report noted a round stationary light that moved quickly to the left and disappeared after six seconds.
witness description: A 25-year-old male who was alone during the sighting.
